tattoo_idea: Do you have an idea for a tattoo? We have time to speak about it and find the right solution for you - contact us.
unique_sketch: If you need help with your choice, we are here for you. We will help you with the font, text and the drawing. We are here for you.
our_goal: Our goal is to be here for you in everything your mind needs in the dynamic world of tattoos and piercings. We will be thankful for choosing us because you leave us your: feelings, happiness, smile, joy, tears, fears, stress, doubts, love, hugs, speaking about everything and nothing, celebratings, memories...Be a human. You are + we are = we are together. Do you have an idea? You are welcome, we will try to help you make your dreams come true.
if_you_have_questions: If you have any questions, you can
tattoo_course_info: You will learn everything from setting up needles and skin preparation to tattoo technics and secrets.
we_provide_courses_info: We provide a professional training for beginners and you can become an expert in this fast growing industry, that opens up a whole diverse world of body modifications. Each course consists of theory and practical lessons. And yes, you can make tattoos/ piercing on yourself or some of your friends. Sign in today on email or telephone.
learn_crucial_skills: Learn the crucial skills needed to become a body piercing professional.
name: Name
